title: Question 15:
description: Is the soft peg of DAI different from the hard peg of USDC to the US dollar in terms of $BOND reward the user receives in the Yield Farming program?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: No, even though the tokens value can fluctuate, the pro rata reward is determined by the number of the tokens so 1 DAI will get you the same as 1 USDC or 1 sUSD of $BOND.
